documents.document: God is placing great opportunities in your life...pause and appreciate them.
Jesus gives you inner peace. That peace is radiated out.
There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear. -1John 4:18
In his name the nations will put their hope - Matthew 12:21
Cast all your anxiety on him, because he cares for you. -1Peter 5.7
Whatever makes you mad, leave it. Whatever makes you smile, keep it.

Happy Birthday to my favorite person in the world, my sissy momma Stella!!! You are a gift from God and I am so grateful to have you!
Let your smile change the world but never let the world change your smile.
Enjoying coffee on a stormy morning. http://t.co/naI8gT6sUw
The richest man is not he who has the most, but he who needs the least.
People too weak to follow their own dreams will always find a way to discourage yours.
This is happening right now. @Starbucks â˜•ï¸ http://t.co/hrlvLAKGcy
In life I have learned to count on myself. Period!!
No matter how long you have traveled in the wrong direction, you can always turn around.
If you don't step forward you will always remain in the same place.
Be kind to everyone you meet.
Never be too busy to take time out of your day for those who matter most.
Where you invest your love you invest your life.
This quote is so true. http://t.co/eLB2QxW9Af
Sometimes God calms the storm, but sometimes God lets the storm rage and calms his child.
Love people for who they are instead of judging them for who they are not.

Each second is a blessing. You never know when your life will end. Life is short and precious.
Behind every setback is an opportunity.
@mishkabob75 He is amazing!!!! Blessed each moment I am alive. Without him I don't know where I would be. ðŸ™ðŸ™ŒðŸ¼

Please tweet me your favorite #positive or #bible #quotes and I will retweet and share with others.

Read this each morning...set it as your screensaver. http://t.co/pOABafoLat
Think about this and make the right choice. http://t.co/ZpOw5rAFmq
Stay strong and never give up. http://t.co/rEZrz9SxDN
Don't worry God is taking care of you.. even if it may seem you are all alone.
Come to me, all you who are weary & burdened, & I will give you rest. -Matt 11:28
Count your blessings and give thanks to God.
Be kind to everyone you meet.
Be grateful for everything you have received in your life. Good and bad it's all brought you to Jesus!
Want to find happiness in your life? Appreciate the small stuff. You are blessed more than you realize.
There are some people in your life who are just not worth stressing over, and that is ok.
